input.sentences: today was the wedding we were all waiting for | we had to have one last bro moment before our bud was fully enslaved .
it was a pretty rad wedding out on the beach | all of our buds were there .
this was by far the best picture | just before they sealed the deal .
looks like the little bro and sis had something to say about the wedding .
it was a pretty rad party wedding | of course the bride was the center of attention | just like in everything else she tries to do .
output.sentences: Lets have a toast before you get married!
